SELECT COUNT(*) pageCommonCount FROM ( SELECT A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, A.CLIENT_CD, A.INFO_SEQ, A.USER_KEY, A.USER_NM, A.USER_ID, A.EMP_NUM, A.RRN, A.MOBILE, A.EMAIL, A.REG_DT, COUNT(1) AS INTAKE_COUNT, GROUP_CONCAT(B.COUNSEL_NM, ' - ', B.STATUS separator '
') AS COUNSEL_NM FROM MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_USER A LEFT JOIN MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_INTAKE B ON A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ = B.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ WHERE INFO_SEQ = #{infoSeq} GROUP BY A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, A.CLIENT_CD, A.INFO_SEQ, A.USER_KEY, A.USER_ID, A.EMP_NUM, A.RRN, A.MOBILE, A.EMAIL ORDER BY A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ DESC ) A LIMIT #{firstIndex} , #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, CLIENT_CD, (SELECT CLIENT_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT WHERE CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) AS CLIENT_NM, INFO_SEQ, USER_KEY, USER_ID, EMP_NUM, RRN, GENDER, (SELECT COMM_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.BRANCH_CD AND CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) AS BRANCH_CD, (SELECT COMM_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) AS DEPT_CD, (SELECT COMM_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.TEAM_CD AND CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) AS TEAM_CD, (SELECT COMM_NM FROM MIND_CLIENT_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_CD = A.GRADE_CD AND CLIENT_CD = A.CLIENT_CD) AS GRADE_CD, MOBILE, EMAIL, USER_NM, REG_DT FROM MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_USER A WHERE COUNSEL_USER_SEQ = #{counselUserSeq}

SELECT COUNSEL_INTAKE_SEQ, COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, FN_GET_COMM_NM(RELATION) AS RELATION, COUNSEL_NM, MOBILE, RRN, FN_GET_COMM_NM(AREA1) AS AREA1, FN_GET_COMM_NM(AREA2) AS AREA2, FN_GET_COMM_NM(COUNSEL_AGE) AS COUNSEL_AGE, FN_GET_COMM_NM(COUNSEL_TYPE) AS COUNSEL_TYPE, COUNSEL_CAUSE, SCHEDULE_CONTENTS, MEMO, STATUS, REG_DT, CENTER_SEQ, (SELECT CONCAT(ADDR1, ' ', ADDR2) FROM MIND_CENTER WHERE CENTER_SEQ = A.CENTER_SEQ) AS CENTER_ADDR, (SELECT CENTER_NM FROM MIND_CENTER WHERE CENTER_SEQ = A.CENTER_SEQ) AS CENTER_NM FROM MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_INTAKE A WHERE COUNSEL_USER_SEQ = #{counselUserSeq}

SELECT A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, A.CLIENT_CD, A.INFO_SEQ, A.USER_KEY, A.USER_NM, A.USER_ID, A.EMP_NUM, A.RRN, A.MOBILE, A.EMAIL, A.REG_DT, COUNT(1) AS INTAKE_COUNT, GROUP_CONCAT(B.COUNSEL_NM, ' - ', B.STATUS separator '\n') AS COUNSEL_NM FROM MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_USER A LEFT JOIN MIND_DISPATCH_COUNSEL_INTAKE B ON A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ = B.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ WHERE INFO_SEQ = #{infoSeq} GROUP BY A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ, A.CLIENT_CD, A.INFO_SEQ, A.USER_KEY, A.USER_ID, A.EMP_NUM, A.RRN, A.MOBILE, A.EMAIL ORDER BY A.COUNSEL_USER_SEQ DESC
